summary: Iâ€™ve just been adding a few features to my [timesheet logger/parser](http://benmcevoy.com.au/blog/unstructured-data), just to make my life a little easier come Monday morning.  I had originally thought to give up on adding any text editor features to this and just have the parsing part as a separate app that used a FileWatcher to track a text file.
title: WPF Find Textbox
